page.title: 03Home Life
page.content: Every week day children get up for school at 07:30 washing,dressing and breakfasting at 08:00.We then prepare for school.At 08:30 we leave home.Most people go by bus or car and some walk. We arrive at school at about 08:50.The bell rings and registration commences at 08:55.In registration we complete homework.At 09:20 lessons begin.There are eight lessons per day,lasting thirty-five minutes each.At 10:30 we have a fifteen minute break.At 12:30 dinner begins.We have a packed lunch or school dinner. After dinner we listen to music or finish homework.At 13:45,lessons recommence.At 15:35 there is registration for five minutes and arrive home at 16:00.We watch T.V. and have tea at 17:00. Tea lasts about 30 minutes.We get two hours homework which we start after tea.At 22:00 we go to bed.
